plotlyutils
============
This package contains some utility functions and htmlwidgets for 
[plotly](https://plot.ly/), and a related talk (see vignettes and the 
[package site](https://alanocallaghan.github.io/plotlyutils/) 
(built with [pkgdown](https://github.com/r-lib/pkgdown)).

Given the interactive nature of the plots in this package,
it is much more useful to look at 
[the pkgdown site for this package](https://alanocallaghan.github.io/plotlyutils/).

Installation
============
```{r, eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("Alanocallaghan/plotlyutils")
```
